alert.note: Alert for Cooper (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued August 13 at 8:16PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill MO has issued a Hydrologic Outlook for the following rivers... Lamine River near Otterville This hydrologic outlook is based on the forecast rainfall for the next 24 hours and estimated runoff from earlier rainfall. Crests may vary if actual rainfall or runoff is greater or less than anticipated. Location: Lamine River near Otterville Flood stage: 15.0 feet Latest stage: 5.1 feet at 7 PM Sunday Maximum Forecast Stage: 15.7 feet at 7 PM Monday Aug 14 Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed 1am 1am 1am Lamine River Otterville 15.0 5.1 Sun 7pm 7.6 13.2 5.1 Later statements, possibly warnings, may be issued as additional information becomes available.
